name: part_004
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・夜公演】AZKi Major Debut LiVE「声音エントロピー」【#AZKiワンマン #AZKiワンマン横浜夜】 [Sg8ijuHDcx0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Opening information segment displaying details about AZKi's Major 1st Album 'Route If'.
Promotional slideshow featuring the song 'Etranger' from the album 'Route If'.

subtitles.original: AZKi メジャー 1st アルバム「Route If」配信中！
subtitles.english: AZKi Major 1st Album "Route If" Now Available!

subtitles.original: 2024.7.24 リリース メジャー 1st アルバム「Route If」収録曲リスト
subtitles.english: 2024.7.24 Release Major 1st Album "Route If" Tracklist

subtitles.original: 初回限定盤 特典 DISC 2 アコースティックアレンジ収録曲
subtitles.english: First Press Limited Edition Bonus DISC 2 Acoustic Arrange Tracks

subtitles.original: 窓の向こう　星たちを
subtitles.english: Beyond the window, the stars

subtitles.original: 数えてたら　眠ってた
subtitles.english: As I was counting them, I fell asleep

subtitles.original: その寝息と　いつか混ざる
subtitles.english: With that breathing, someday I'll mix in

subtitles.original: 画面の向こう　そばにいる
subtitles.english: Beyond the screen, I'm by your side

subtitles.original: 言葉なんてない　傷つくこともない
subtitles.english: There are no words, no getting hurt

subtitles.original: まるでね　エトランゼ　愛しくて
subtitles.english: Just like an etranger, so dear

subtitles.original: こんなにそばにいるのに　本当は遠い存在
subtitles.english: Even though I'm this close, you're actually a distant presence

subtitles.original: 使えてた言葉が　涙になったフレーバー
subtitles.english: The words I used to use have turned into tears, a flavor

subtitles.original: 今日も頑張ったんだね
subtitles.english: You did your best today too

subtitles.original: 本当は手を差し伸べたい
subtitles.english: I really want to reach out a hand

subtitles.original: ああ　私の知らない
subtitles.english: Ah, about you

subtitles.original: 君のことを
subtitles.english: whom I don't know

subtitles.original: どうすればいい？　何でもない
subtitles.english: What should I do? It's nothing

subtitles.original: 何かすると　崩れそう
subtitles.english: If I do something, it feels like it'll crumble

subtitles.original: 独りここで　思いを馳せ
subtitles.english: Alone here, letting my thoughts wander

subtitles.original: 時間だけが　過ぎてゆく
subtitles.english: Only time passes by

subtitles.original: 知らないうち
subtitles.english: Before I knew it

subtitles.original: 星は広がってた
subtitles.english: the stars had spread out

subtitles.original: 君だけ　君だけを待ってる
subtitles.english: I'm waiting for only you, only you

subtitles.original: パノラマ
subtitles.english: Panorama

subtitles.original: 雲の向こう
subtitles.english: Beyond the clouds

subtitles.original: ゆらゆらと
subtitles.english: Swaying gently

subtitles.original: イメージは
subtitles.english: The image

subtitles.original: 心地いいのに
subtitles.english: Even though it's comfortable

subtitles.original: こんなにそばにいるのに　本当は遠い存在
subtitles.english: Even though I'm this close, you're actually a distant presence

subtitles.original: 会いたいな　会えないな
subtitles.english: I want to see you, I can't see you

subtitles.original: 吸い込まれた気持ち
subtitles.english: these feelings were sucked in

subtitles.original: 今日も頑張ったんだね
subtitles.english: You did your best today too

subtitles.original: どうか君に届くように
subtitles.english: I hope it reaches you somehow

subtitles.original: ああ　見守ってる
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm watching over you

subtitles.original: ずっと遠くから
subtitles.english: from far away
